trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Greenwich
There were no other sightings in Greenwich on or around June 15th 1971
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsIn bed.Floated out of closed window,(memory recoverd through hypnosis by Bud Hopkins)Saw my self standing in driveway in my blue pajamas with big white buttons.At the front left corner of my house I looked over beech tree in neighbors yard saw cigar shaped craft that looked as it had been camoflauged.Next craft must have been over me,my arm over my eyes,light to bright.On craft on silver table.Short being holding up right hand,three long fingers.Felt like being at head of table more capacity but could not see it.Have more info,physical,medical.
Summary: Floated through closed window,saw cigar shaped craft,bush lit up like arc welder,on craft on silver table, being at my feet.
